faq.title: What is Mors Manipulus?
faq.text: Mors Manipulus is an app that allows you to calculate how much power you need to run your home.

faq.title: Do i need to pay to use the platform?
faq.text: No, Mors Manipulus is a completely free app and no payment is required.

faq.title: Do i need to signup?
faq.text: Mors Manipulus does require any registration, just open calculator and you are ready to go.

faq.title: Do we sell solar panels?
faq.text: No, we currently do not sell.

faq.title: How often can i use Mors Manipulus?
